titles.title: PRIME Act
PRIME Act
Promoting Responsibility In Markets and E-Retailers Act of 2019
A bill to require online retailers to prominently disclose product country-of-origin information, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: Promoting Responsibility In Markets and E-Retailers Act of 2019 or the PRIME Act This bill requires products sold through online retailers to disclose a product’s country of origin in accordance with existing requirements for other imported products. Specifically, online retailers must require sellers to provide the country of origin for the online retailer to disclose to consumers. Further, sellers and distributors of internet applications (i.e., computer programs or software downloaded by a user through an internet-connected device) must disclose to the user the country of origin of the developer, publisher, and, if applicable, parent corporation.
